text: Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kiti eii khachu Miring Sapa in ama apoinale inruoiya Manmasituol Kathar khan ama reng in-ongna khan in-ong pha, nangni anakajui soomleini ngai um reng in-ongna khan ningla in-ong sik eii, halli Israel zaat soomleini ngaikha chong katansik ni-eii.” Matt 25:31; Luk 22:30
